Touchpad mode
Control the mouse by rotating the mobile phone. \n Rotate the mouse horizontally, move the mouse up and down. \n Press and hold the lock key to rotate the mobile phone without moving the mouse
Use the finger touch control here to control the mouse. \n One finger moves the mouse and two fingers scroll the page. \n One finger click is the left button and two fingers click is the right button

Following system Save and In order to provide better service for you, please read the user agreement and privacy policy related to this product carefully before using this product. Click "agree" to indicate that you accept and abide by this agreement. User agreement Privacy policy Welcome to MobileMouse! You can use this app as a mouse to control your PC mouse. In addition, in order to better use the product functions, you need to ask for your permission to obtain the following permissions: In order to make better use of product functions, the app also asks for your permission to obtain the following permissions: Network permission Including network access rights, IP address, etc., only after you have network access rights can you connect and control the PC devices in the LAN; in addition, we need to download programs online to update data; and help us to count the use of products, feed back product bugs, and help us continuously improve product functions and experience.> Device information It includes device ID / screen size / operating system / device model / network connection mode / mobile country code / screen resolution and system language; it is used to provide different functions and experiences according to different devices and system versions, obtain product usage and bug information, and help us continuously improve product functions and experiences. Agree and continue Disagree and exit I agree I got it
How to use MobileMouse ï¼Ÿ\n \n 1. Please install mobilemouse server server software on your PC and start it.\n 2. Connect the mobile phone to the WiFi under the same router as the computer.\n 3. In the main interface, click "scan device" and then click the scanned device, or click "+" to manually input the IP address of the device to be connected, and then click Connect.\n 4. After entering the interface, wait for the connection to be completed, and the connection will be displayed at the bottom. Then you can use your mobile phone to control the computer.\n 5. Click the keyboard button to open the software keyboard.\n
